text: Martin Trevor Heinrich (born October 17, 1971) is an American politician. He is the senior United States Senator for New Mexico. He was in office since 2013. From 2009 to 2013 Heinrich was the U.S. Representative for . He is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American Lutherans Category:Politicians from Nevada Category:United States representatives from New Mexico Category:United States senators from New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Martin Heinrich
